personal.name: Kim Anthony Rabut

personal.bio: A passionate web development student with a keen eye for design and a drive for creating interactive web experiences. Currently pursuing my degree at CSU Aparri, specializing in front-end development and modern web technologies.

projects.title: Blogsite
projects.description: A modern blogging platform that enables users to share and express their ideas through an intuitive interface. Features include user authentication, rich text editing, and responsive design.

projects.title: Tricycle Booking System
projects.description: A prototype web application developed as a school project to streamline tricycle bookings. Includes real-time tracking, fare calculation, and booking management features.

experience.description: Pursuing a degree in Information Technology with a focus on web development. Active participant in coding competitions and tech events. Currently maintaining a strong academic performance while working on various web development projects.
Working on various web development projects for small businesses and local clients. Specializing in creating responsive websites and web applications.
